title: A Taste For Revenge
description: **Includes mature content**Ian Mordoor has a job to do before he takes over as leader of the Ruean vampire clan. His first order of business is to hunt down a rogue vampire who brutally killed a human. Track him, then take the sadistic bastard out; it's all strictly business to Ian. That is, until an intriguing human woman named Jax Markson not only derails his operation, but shifts his focus. Suddenly Ian's hunt takes on a whole new meaning.
author: Patrice Michelle
